q: his disdain for the`` job-killing'' healthcare bill. That job-killing label, by the way, is appropriate. Even PolitiFact admits it within an article running interference for Democrat Allen Boyd . PolitiFact said, It's much more accurate, for instance, to say that the 700 jobs were lost because the health care bill passed. Those jobs belonged to Sallie Mae employees and I happened to meet one of those employees who'd worked for the company for years. Mike Pence has also worked hard on issues like freedom of speech.

A story published Saturday said Mitch Daniels would be the odds-on favorite for the GOP nomination in 2012 if pundits, conservative columnists and political thinkers represented the party's base. The diminutive Hoosier has nurtured a profile as a mature politician whose outlook extends beyond the next news cycle and whose demeanor exudes seriousness, the story said. a target. Labour's deputy leader Harriet Harman told Sky's Dermot Murnaghan that allegations of illegal activity must be investigated.`` Hacking into people's phones is illegal,'' she said. Obviously the criminal law has got to be complied with and if it is broken then it should be investigated by the police and it should be enforced.`` Nobody is above the law, no newspaper editor, no journalist. The scandal has already cost Number 10 spin doctor Andy Coulson his job amid claims he presided over the illegal action at the tabloid. This is good news for operators, he said.`` We are in a position to create a third ecosystem. We know what it means to be the most friendly to the operators.''
